FileUploader.dropzone: Drop file here or click to select file

GameUploadDialog.title: Upload Game
GameUploadDialog.alert1Description:
You can upload the game resources file here. The file you upload will be stored on the server of Shionlib, and provided to all users for download.
Please note that you will not receive any benefits from this.
Once the upload process is completed successfully, you will not be able to revoke this upload, and you will not be able to delete the files stored on the server of Shionlib, the final ownership of the files belongs to the Shionlib.
GameUploadDialog.alert2Description:
Uploading files will consume your "Upload Quota". After the upload process starts, the corresponding file size quota will be pre-deducted. If the upload process is not completed successfully, the quota will not be consumed.
The game file needs to be packaged in a [b]single[/b] zip file, and [b]cannot be set to a password[/b].
After the upload is completed, the system will check the file and finally upload it to S3, and the download information will be updated after all processes are completed.
Please do not refresh or close the page during the upload process.
GameUploadDialog.platformPlaceholder: Select the running platform of the resource
GameUploadDialog.languagePlaceholder: Select the game language of the resource
GameUploadDialog.waitForUploadCompleted: Wait for the file to be uploaded

validation.note: Note must be less than 255 characters
